ygData.subject: Re: Post Patch Procing
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow I thought it was only me. I baught 2 gnoll hid lariats a few days ago for kick and the stun proc. I took my enchanter friend to Fp arena  to show him my
ygData.messageBody:
Wow I thought it was only me. I baught 2 gnoll hid lariats a few days ago
for kick and the stun proc. I took my enchanter friend to Fp arena to show
him my neat somewhat useless toys. I told him " you should see how much I
stun wielding 2 of these, it funny"

He stood there I sang Berserkers. I got him down to 2 bubbles no proces I
healed him up and did this about 5 times.. and got ONE proc the entire
time.. I was thinking it was just an arena/duel thing. I did not get to test
it on a mob though for I went on a wonderfull nagga raid shortly. We
slaughtere him. (yes he is buffed more now) the previous group tried for 5
hours and mass people died till they gave nagga up to the more experienced
raids..


The one thing we did on nagga since he removes buffs.. we made a "useless
buff line" we would buff everyone with all the useless enchantments THEN
last we would do the resist hp buffs etc... it worked great.. naga would
remobe the useless buffs first. :)



Tuldar
45th bard Tarew marr....
HI maeve.. he was there to in all his red beard!..
-----Original Message-----
From: JasonF <JasonF@...>
To: Eqbards@... <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, January 21, 2000 10:21 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Post Patch Procing


>From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
>
>I'm not too concerned yet, but did anyone else playing last night notice a
>staggering drop in the number of procs that their weapons are firing? I
was
>fighting Ogre Bouncers inside Oggok last night with my Ykesha and I believe
>the number of times it fired over the course of about 4 hours of play was
>either 2 or 3 - that's a very serious drop, perhaps an order of magnitude.
>The last hour or so I loaded up all of my DEX equipment and played Chant of
>Battle and had a DEX of 186 and didn't proc once. After killing Bouncers I
>ran over to Cazic-Thule and beat on some lizzies and gators for testing
>purposes (also 186 DEX) and got not a single proc while there (around 20
>solo kills).
>
>Crier Sharpsong
>
>
>
